articles.title: Trump Tariff Threats Weigh on Asian Risk Appetite: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: European and US stock futures fell and haven assets such as gold rallied after President Donald Trump proposed new levies on eight countries that have opposed his plans to acquire Greenland. The dollar weakened against most of its major peers.

articles.title: United works to get plane off Orlando runway after flight from Chicago experiences ‘issue’ upon landing, airline says - WKMG

articles.title: Hassett Says Trump May Be Right to Pass Him Over for Fed Chair - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: White House economic adviser Kevin Hassett said President Donald Trump may well keep him in his current job, which would eliminate him from contention for the next Federal Reserve chair.
